translation.en: [man 1] What the hell?
[man 2] This way! This way! Whoo-hoo!
[men chanting in Latin] Thus has it always been, and thus shall it ever be.
translation.de: So war es immer, so wird es immer sein.

translation.en: [Neil] "Do not weep for me For I have not gone"
translation.de: "Weine nicht um mich, denn ich bin nicht gegangen.

translation.en: "I am the wind that shakes the mighty oak"
translation.de: Ich bin der Wind, der die mächtige Eiche erschüttert.

translation.en: "I am the gentle rain That falls upon your face"
translation.de: Der sanfte Regen, der auf dein Gesicht fällt.

translation.en: "I am the spring flower That pushes through the dark earth"
translation.de: Ich bin die Frühlingsblume, die sich durch die dunkle Erde drängt.

translation.en: "I am the chuckling laughter Of the mountain stream"
translation.de: Ich bin das kichernde Gelächter des Bergbachs."

translation.en: [vicar] Yea, though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil.
translation.de: Obwohl ich durchs dunkle Tal wandere, fürchte ich nichts Böses.

translation.en: Thy rod and thy staff, they comfort me.
translation.de: Dein Stecken und Stab trösten mich.

translation.en: We commit our brother to the ground.
translation.de: Wir übergeben unseren Bruder dem Boden.

translation.en: Earth to earth,
ashes to ashes,
dust to dust.
-Maya Stern. -Military?
No. I'm in fancy dress.
Me too. Penguin.
-[imitates penguin] -[chuckles] Very convincing.
So, seeing as we're both here at this ridiculous charity party,
translation.de: Da wir auf dieser lächerlichen Wohltätigkeitsparty sind,

translation.en: would you allow me to buy you a drink?
What, from the free bar? Have whatever you want. My treat.
translation.de: -Die Bar ist kostenlos. -Was du willst. Geht auf mich.

translation.en: I should warn you,
in 11 hours, I'll be on a plane back to base.
translation.de: in 11 Stunden fliege ich zurück zur Basis.

translation.en: Well, in that case, we'd better make the most of the time that we have,
translation.de: Dann sollten wir die Zeit nutzen, die wir haben,

translation.en: No! Joe!
[Maya sobbing] Joe! Joe, Joe!
Come on, darling.
-You okay? -[Maya] Yeah, thanks, Shane.
-Detective Kierce. -Oh, Maya, these are excellent.
What are they? Vol-au-vents?
What, you've come for the catering? Or you've found my husband's killer?
translation.de: Wollen Sie essen, oder fanden Sie den Mörder meines Mannes?

translation.en: Ah, Joe's mum invited me.
[Maya] Oh. Well, you'd think a psychiatrist would know better.
translation.de: Man sollte meinen, eine Psychiaterin wüsste es besser.

translation.en: Not today, but there's some things I need to follow up on, about the attack.
translation.de: Heute nicht, aber ich habe Fragen wegen des Angriffs.

translation.en: Look, I have given you three statements, and you're no closer to catching them.
translation.de: Ich habe drei Aussagen gemacht, und Sie sind nicht näher dran.

translation.en: Your shoelace, it's undone.
Why did you invite that detective?
translation.de: Warum hast du den Detective eingeladen?

translation.en: I wanted him to see who Joe was.
translation.de: Er sollte sehen, wer Joe war.

translation.en: That he was important.
That he was loved by his brothers and sister.
translation.de: Dass er von seinen Geschwistern geliebt wurde.

translation.en: That he grew up in this big house where he spent his childhood.
translation.de: Dass er in diesem großen Haus aufwuchs, wo er seine Kindheit verbrachte.

translation.en: How are you coping?
I'm grieving.
I lost the love of my life.
translation.de: Er war die Liebe meines Lebens.

translation.en: No, I'm grieving.
There's something more going on with you.
translation.de: Da ist noch mehr mit dir.

translation.en: I'm fine.
I don't want to push you today, but I think you should get help.
translation.de: Ich will dich nicht drängen, aber du solltest Hilfe holen.

translation.en: There's so much you're dealing with. First, you lose your sister.
translation.de: Du hast so viel um die Ohren. Erst verlierst du deine Schwester.

translation.en: Now, Joe.
And all that army business.
I'd better attend to the guests.
translation.de: Ich kümmere mich um die Gäste.

translation.en: [Eva] Whose idea was hymns?
Who do you think?
I must have told them ten times, play The Doors,
translation.de: Ich habe ihnen gesagt, sie sollen The Doors spielen.

translation.en: play… Nirvana.
[in posh voice] Play Nirvana? At a funeral?
-Do you know how much they spent? -Go on.
The coffin cost more than your car. [grunts] Well, that's not saying much.
translation.de: -Der Sarg kostet mehr als dein Auto. -Das heißt nicht viel.

translation.en: I don't want to leave you. I'll be fine.
Look, I know you think you will,
translation.de: Ich weiß, dass du das denkst,

translation.en: but I don't care if it's 3:00 in the morning,
translation.de: aber es ist egal, ob es 3 Uhr morgens ist,

translation.en: if you have a wobble… yeah?
Oh, which reminds me.
-I've got something for you. -Oh?
[Eva] It is…
a digital picture frame.
It rotates photos of you and your family.
translation.de: Er wechselt Fotos von dir und deiner Familie.

translation.en: Okay…
I've already pre-loaded some of you, Joe, Lily, and the family.
translation.de: Ich habe schon einige von euch geladen, Joe, Lily und die Familie.

translation.en: Except, that's not all it is.
Ready?
[chuckles] Do you want to see that funky move again? Please.
translation.de: -Willst du die Moves noch mal sehen? -Ja.

translation.en: Well, you can. It's all caught on here, on a secret camera,
translation.de: Das kannst du. Es ist alles auf einer geheimen Kamera, die aufnimmt,

translation.en: which records when there's movement.
Why have you got me a secret camera?
So you can keep an eye on Lily when you're not here.
translation.de: Du kannst auf Lily aufpassen, wenn du nicht da bist.

translation.en: -When she's with Izabella? -Exactly. Nanny cam.
translation.de: -Wenn sie mit Izabella zusammen ist? -Genau. Nanny Cam.

translation.en: I'm sure Izabella's great, but what harm does it do to keep an eye on her?
translation.de: Izabella ist sicher toll, aber so kann man sie im Auge behalten.

translation.en: Eva, her family's and Joe's go way back.
translation.de: Eva, ihre Familie und Joes kennen sich schon lange.

translation.en: Well, I am putting it in her playroom.
translation.de: Ich stelle ihn in ihr Spielzimmer.

translation.en: -Hi. -[man] Morning.
Ready for your next lesson? -Yeah, can't wait. -Let's go.
translation.de: -Bereit für die nächste Stunde? Los. -Ja, sehr.

translation.en: Okay, you can take her up today.
Okay?
If you'd like to take a slight turn to the left.
translation.de: Jetzt eine leichte Biegung nach links.

translation.en: Okay, will do.
[Maya] That's good.
Right. Keep-- Keep your eyes on the horizon.
That's a nasty graze to his elbow there.
Is that what they teach military police? -I was aiming for his elbow. -Ah.
translation.de: -Bringt man das der Militärpolizei bei? -Ich zielte so.

translation.en: Want a turn?
No. Wouldn't want to embarrass you.
translation.de: Nein. Ich will dich nicht blamieren.

translation.en: How long have you been back at work?
-Three days. -Right.
-What? -Nothing.
What am I supposed to do?
Sit at home, stare at a wall?
No, but, you know…
It's my grief, Shane.
-We need some normality. -Okay.
Listen, me and the guys, we were talking…
translation.de: Ich und die Jungs haben geredet…

translation.en: -Oh, go on. -How about we come over this weekend?
Nothing crazy. Just a few drinks. Keep you company.
translation.de: Ein paar Drinks. Wir leisten dir Gesellschaft.

translation.en: So, it's too soon for me to be back in work,
translation.de: Es ist zu früh, um wieder zu arbeiten,

translation.en: -but not for a piss-up, hmm? -[buzzer sounds]
Hello?
-[gasps] -[Lily] Mummy!
-[Maya] Hey! Good girl. -[Lily giggles]
-Hi! -Hi, Maya. Hi. Has everything been all right?
translation.de: -Hi. Ist hier alles in Ordnung? -Hi, Maya.

translation.en: Of course. We've had fun, haven't we, Lily? Yeah?
translation.de: Natürlich. Wir hatten Spaß, oder, Lily? Ja?

translation.en: We made…
-Angels. -Yeah, that's right.
[Maya] You made angels?
-[Izabella] Why don't you show Mummy? -Go on. Go on.
-[Lily] Come. Come with me. -[Maya] You go in. One minute.
translation.de: Komm mit. Geh vor. Einen Moment.

translation.en: -[Lily giggles] -She's been talking about heaven, so I-- Yeah, no, it's fine. It's fine.
translation.de: -Sie redet vom Himmel, also… -Ja, schon gut.

translation.en: Listen, you get off, um…
It's fine. I'm going to, uh, look at these amazing angels.
translation.de: Schon gut. Ich sehe mir diese tollen Engel an.

translation.en: See you, darling.
[gasps] Oh, clever girl!
Wow, show me. Show me.
-I'm winning. -Oh, big girl.
Ready…
Right, Lily.
Right, breakfast. Go and sit down.
Go and sit in your chair.
Good girl. Here.
Hi, Judith. Listen, I'm just rushing off to work.
translation.de: Hi, Judith. Ich muss zur Arbeit.

translation.en: Can I call you back?
I thought you could come over to Farnwood this weekend with Lily.
translation.de: Komm doch dieses Wochenende mit Lily nach Farnwood.

translation.en: That's kind of you, um, but I can't this weekend.
translation.de: Das ist nett, aber ich treffe Freunde.

translation.en: -I've arranged to see friends. -She spent a lot of time here, Maya,
translation.de: aber ich treffe Freunde. Sie war oft hier, als du weg warst.

translation.en: when you were away.
translation.de: Sie war oft hier, als du weg warst.

translation.en: I know you're not used to being a full-time mother, but children need their routines.
translation.de: Du bist keine Vollzeitmutter, aber Kinder brauchen Routinen.

translation.en: Yeah, I know. I know.
Listen, why don't I call you later and we can arrange another day?
translation.de: Ich rufe später an und wir vereinbaren etwas.

translation.en: Okay. Yes. Call me later.
I'm only thinking about what's best for Lily.
translation.de: Ich will nur das Beste für Lily.

translation.en: All right, bye.
Unbelievable.
[Maya] Lily.
-Did you see Daddy? -Dada.
Did you see Daddy yesterday when I wasn't here?
He came over, and he-- and he gave you a cuddle, and he sat you on his lap?
translation.de: Er kam rüber, umarmte dich und setzte dich auf seinen Schoß?

translation.en: Okay. All right, Mommy's being silly. I'm sorry.
translation.de: Ok. Mami ist albern. Tut mir leid.

translation.en: Fuck.
Can I speak with you?
-Now? -Yes, now.
I need to show you something.
[Izabella] What is this?
[Maya] It's a camera.
-You record me? -Just watch.
-You're spying on me? -Right, just watch, watch.
-How do you explain this? -I don't know what you mean.
That man there, you saw him. You saw who that was?
translation.de: Dieser Mann. Hast du gesehen, wer das war?

translation.en: -Who? -What do you mean, "Who?"
-It's Joe! How the hell can that be? -Please, Mrs. Burkett, you're scaring me!
translation.de: -Joe! Wie kann das sein? -Mrs. Burkett, Sie machen mir Angst!

translation.en: Look. It's fucking Joe.
-He's dead, Izabella. -You're hurting me.
translation.de: -Er ist tot, Izabella. -Sie tun mir weh.

translation.en: He's dead, and he's there on the camera whilst you were in the house.
translation.de: Er ist tot, und er wurde gefilmt, als du im Haus warst.

translation.en: [Lily] Momma!
It's all right, darling. Just go back in and watch your show.
translation.de: Schon gut, Schatz. Geh und schau deine Serie.

translation.en: Go on. It's all right. It's okay.
I want answers.
I need some water.
-Ow! Fuck! -[glass shatters]
What the hell happened?
Got pepper sprayed.
-Pepper sprayed? -Yeah, by my nanny.
Are you serious?
No. No, I'm a gifted comedian.
translation.de: Nein, ich bin eine begabte Komikerin.

translation.en: Nothing warms up a crowd like the "pepper spray nanny" routine.
All right, Maya. That's a serious offense.
translation.de: Maya, das ist ein ernstes Vergehen.

translation.en: [Maya] Oh God.
You okay?
Can I ask what prompted it?
I saw something on my nanny cam, and I challenged her about it.
translation.de: Ich habe etwas auf meiner Kamera gesehen und sie danach gefragt.

translation.en: Okay. What did you see?
-It's going to sound crazy. -Try me.
[Maya] It's gone.
-Gone? -[sputtering] Yeah, the SD card is gone.
-All right. -She must have taken it.
-After she pepper sprayed you? -Yes.
So, what was on it?
Joe. So it was, uh…
-It was an old tape. -No, it wasn't. It was from yesterday.
translation.de: -Ein altes Band. -Nein. Es war von gestern.

translation.en: -You know that-- You know that can't be. -He was wearing his green shirt.
translation.de: Das kann nicht sein. Er trug sein grünes Hemd. Es ist nicht im Schrank. Oder die Schuhe.

translation.en: That's not in his wardrobe. Or his shoes.
translation.de: Er trug sein grünes Hemd. Es ist nicht im Schrank. Oder die Schuhe.

translation.en: Are you sure it was Joe, Maya?
translation.de: Sicher, dass es Joe war, Maya?

translation.en: He went to Lily, and she cuddled him.
translation.de: Er ging zu Lily, und sie knuddelte ihn.

translation.en: Did you ask Lily?
She said he wasn't here.
You know…
-Grief can do funny things. -It's not grief.
translation.de: -Trauer bewirkt komische Dinge. -Es ist keine Trauer.

translation.en: -I'm sorry. -No, it's all right.
Look, I'm fine. I'm just…
-[clears throat] Okay. -You wanted to ask me a few questions?
translation.de: -Ok. -Sie wollten mir ein paar Fragen stellen?

translation.en: Yeah, if you're okay now.
translation.de: Ja, wenn es Ihnen gut geht.

translation.en: Thanks.
In your original statement on the night of the attack,
translation.de: In Ihrer ursprünglichen Aussage über den Angriff

translation.en: you said two masked youths appeared in the park on scramble bikes.
translation.de: sagten Sie, dass zwei maskierte Jugendliche auf Motorrädern auftauchten.

translation.en: Yeah.
And then you said they stopped in front of you
translation.de: Und Sie sagten, sie hielten vor Ihnen an

translation.en: and attempted to grab your bag.
translation.de: und versuchten, Ihre Tasche zu stehlen.

translation.en: Correct.
Right, and then, um…
And then you said…
I resisted. A fight broke out.
translation.de: Ich habe mich gewehrt. Es gab einen Kampf.

translation.en: Um, one of them had hold of my bag, he wouldn't let go, and I, uh, was pushed.
translation.de: Einer hielt meine Tasche fest und ich wurde geschubst.

translation.en: I fell backwards.
They were demanding that Joe handed over his wallet, and he wouldn't.
translation.de: Joe sollte ihnen seine Brieftasche geben, was er nicht tat.

translation.en: Then, all of a sudden, out of nowhere,
he pulled out a gun.
I tried to call for help.
But before I could, I just heard…
By the time I got to Joe…
he was on the floor.
Dying.
Joe! Joe, Joe, Joe…
Besides a very detailed description of the suspects,
translation.de: Außer einer detaillierten Beschreibung der Verdächtigen

translation.en: you were able to tell us that the youth in the red Nike trainers
translation.de: sagten Sie, dass der Junge in den roten Nike-Schuhen

translation.en: was carrying a 9-millimeter Glock 17. Now…
that's very impressive.
To identify a weapon like that.
[inhales] I was issued one. Overseas.
Do you miss the army?
I loved combat.
The adrenaline. The fear.
It was addictive.
But that's all over now.
As you know, despite never finding the weapon itself,
translation.de: Wir haben zwar die Waffe nie gefunden,

translation.en: we recovered three bullets from your husband's body
translation.de: aber drei Kugeln von der Leiche Ihres Mannes

translation.en: and three cases from the scene consistent with a Glock 17.
translation.de: und drei Hülsen vom Tatort, die zur Glock 17 passen.

translation.en: Now, you own guns, don't you, Maya?
Yes.
Do you keep any of them here?
[Maya] They're in here.
No one can get their hands on them, especially Lily.
translation.de: Niemand kommt an sie ran, vor allem Lily.

translation.en: Well, how do you open it?
Thumbprint.
That's, uh, quite the collection. Does anyone else have access to these?
translation.de: Was für eine Sammlung. Hat noch jemand Zugang dazu?

translation.en: No. Well, Joe used to. But…
What's that?
It's old.
Deactivated.
-[Sami] Glock 17? -Yeah.
-[Sami] Is this your only handgun? -Yep. The only one.
translation.de: Ihre einzige Pistole? Ja. Die Einzige.

translation.en: And it's legally registered as deactivated.
As I'm sure you already know.
So shall we stop playing games and you tell me what it is that you want?
translation.de: Sagen Sie mir jetzt, was Sie wirklich wollen?

translation.en: What I want, Maya,
is to go away and test it. Go on.
translation.de: ist, sie testen zu lassen. Los.

translation.en: -What, you think I killed my husband? -No, Maya.
translation.de: -Sie denken, ich tötete meinen Mann? -Nein, Maya.

translation.en: You buried him. I was there.
translation.de: Sie haben ihn beerdigt. Ich war da.

translation.en: So he wasn't on the nanny cam.
translation.de: Er war nicht auf der Kamera.

translation.en: [Molly] Hi.
Hiya, sweetheart. How was your day?
translation.de: Hi, Schatz. Wie war dein Tag?

translation.en: Yeah, good. Well, I say good.
I had a six-year-old say "bellend" this morning.
-[chuckling] -Had to ring his parents.
-And were they bellends? -Most definitely.
So, tonight, you got your dancing shoes ready?
Of course.
Right, and don't forget, 6:00 p.m.
Yeah? And it's side together, side tap, side together. Yes?
translation.de: Ja? Und es geht: seitlich, tippen, seitlich, zusammen. Ja?

translation.en: Love you.
[chuckles] Love you too. Bye.
[man] And there's a board members' call at 2:45.
-It's in your diary. -Mm. Joy of joys.
Excuse me.
Oh. Daughter-in-law.
Reconsidering my offer?
No, um…
I need to ask you something about Joe.
translation.de: Ich muss dich etwas über Joe fragen.

translation.en: What is it?
When you, uh… when you went to see him…
translation.de: Als du… Als du zu ihm gegangen bist,

translation.en: -to… identify his body… -[mysterious music playing]
Yes?
What did he look like?
Why on earth would you ask me that?
"What did he look like?" What sort of a question is that, Maya?
translation.de: "Wie sah er aus?" Was soll diese Frage?

translation.en: Because I never saw his body.
Maya, please. I urge you to think again about counseling.
translation.de: Maya, bitte, du solltest zur Therapie gehen.

translation.en: I have an excellent colleague at the clinic. Specializes in grief.
translation.de: Ich habe einen tollen Kollegen. Spezialisiert auf Trauer.

translation.en: I don't need counseling.
Please, just tell me what he looked like.
translation.de: Bitte sag mir, wie er aussah.

translation.en: -There's no stigma attached to it, Maya. -Judith.
He looked like what he was.
translation.de: Er sah aus, wie er war.

translation.en: Beautiful.
But a body.
Everything that made him Joe
translation.de: Alles, was ihn zu Joe machte,

translation.en: was gone.
-All right, thank you. -[man] Okay, mate.
[Sami] Yep. All right. Yep.
Cheers. All right. Thanks. Yeah.
Oh, God.
[Pam] A cat?
[chuckles dryly] Yeah, from nowhere. It jumped out, I swerved.
translation.de: Ja, aus dem Nichts. Sie sprang raus, ich wich aus.

translation.en: Next thing I know, I've hit a fence.
-Are you okay? -Yeah, yeah, yeah. Not a scratch, unlike the car.
translation.de: -Alles ok? -Ja. Keine Kratzer, nur am Auto.

translation.en: -Can I have a replacement? -Most likely.
But, Sami, I'm just going to ask you this straight.
translation.de: Aber, Sami, ich frage dich ehrlich.

translation.en: -Oh, come on, Pam. -You've had your challenges.
And I know you've risen to meet them, but we're all capable of--
translation.de: Du hast sie gemeistert, aber wir sind alle…

translation.en: One thousand, two hundred seventy-eight days sober.
Do you know how long that is? Nearly three and a half years.
-You're getting married. -And?
Oh, come on, Sami. Are you sure the wedding's not bringing back
translation.de: Komm schon, Sami. Bist du sicher, dass die Hochzeit

translation.en: unhappy memories of what happened last time?
It was a cat.
It was an accident.
It was a complete freak event.
[Pam] Okay, fine.
I'm partnering you up on the Joe Burkett case.
translation.de: Du bekommst einen Partner im Burkett-Fall.

translation.en: Oh, no, no, no. Come on.
Marty McGreggor. He's young, he's bright, and he'll benefit from the wisdom of an older man.
translation.de: Marty McGreggor. Er ist jung, klug, profitiert von der Weisheit eines Älteren.

translation.en: So I'm being babysat by a child?
Don't see it as babysitting.
-[Sami groans] -See it as someone to help you avoid cats.
translation.de: Er wird helfen, dass du Katzen vermeidest.

translation.en: [Marty] Oh my God, this is-- this is so exciting.
translation.de: Oh mein Gott, das ist so aufregend.

translation.en: Sir, I'm really stoked to be…
You know, I think we'll be a really good team.
translation.de: Wir werden ein gutes Team sein.

translation.en: -Oh God. -I think-- Are you-- Are you stoked?
Just here. Yeah. Yes, yes, I'm stoked. Very stoked.
translation.de: Ja, ich bin begeistert. Sehr begeistert.

translation.en: This is where the attack happened. Do you know who Margrete was?
translation.de: Hier geschah der Angriff. Weißt du, wer Margrete war?

translation.en: -Oh, a painter, was she? -No.
The ruler of Denmark, Norway, and Sweden in the 1300s.
translation.de: Die Herrscherin Dänemarks, Norwegens und Schwedens um 1300.

translation.en: Now, you're probably thinking…
-[slurping] -…why does she have a corner
in a UK park?
[Marty gulps drink] Uh, yeah, why?
-Fuck knows. -Ah. [chuckles softly]
But she does.
And this is where Joe Burkett was murdered on the night of the 12th.
translation.de: Und hier wurde Joe Burkett in der Nacht des 12. ermordet.

translation.en: The wife's statement's all we have to go on.
translation.de: Wir haben nur die Aussage der Frau.

translation.en: Come on.
You know she left the army under controversial circumstances?
translation.de: Sie verließ die Armee unter kontroversen Umständen.

translation.en: Yeah, yeah. It was a kind of a whistleblower thing, right?
translation.de: Ja. Es war eine Art Whistleblower-Sache, oder?

translation.en: Yeah.
Yeah, she killed innocent civilians. Corey the Whistle leaked the details.
translation.de: Sie tötete unschuldige Zivilisten. Corey leakte die Details.

translation.en: -People wanted her in prison. I remember. -Yeah.
Yeah, and then-- then…
And then today, she claimed to see her dead husband alive.
translation.de: Heute behauptete sie, ihren toten Mann lebend gesehen zu haben.

translation.en: -What? -Yeah.
Nice me says,
she's in grief.
She lost her sister and her husband in a short period of time,
translation.de: Sie verlor ihre Schwester und ihren Mann in kurzer Zeit,

translation.en: and she's seeing things. But…
…the cynical me says,
if she did do it, maybe she's trying to show us that she's losing it,
translation.de: wenn sie es war, zeigt sie uns vielleicht, dass sie durchdreht.

translation.en: you know, to plead diminished responsibility.
translation.de: Um auf eine verminderte Schuldfähigkeit zu plädieren.

translation.en: Well… does she have a motive?
Well, you learn motive isn't always clear.
translation.de: Das Motiv ist nicht immer klar.

translation.en: -You know, we dig. -Right.
-We find reasons. -Okay.
Oh, well, uh, rich family. I mean, Burkett Global Enterprises. Kerching!
translation.de: Oh, reiche Familie. Ich meine, Burkett Global Enterprises.

translation.en: Is she in line for a big payout? Some life insurance.
But most of the money goes into trust for their daughter,
translation.de: Das meiste Geld fließt in einen Treuhandfonds für ihre Tochter,

translation.en: but that was all pre-agreed years ago.
translation.de: aber das wurde vor Jahren vereinbart.

translation.en: So, well, maybe it is exactly as she says, you know.
translation.de: Vielleicht ist es genau so, wie sie sagt.

translation.en: Two kids on motorbikes.
Yeah. Yeah.
Which is why we need a ballistics check on her gun.
translation.de: Deshalb müssen wir ihre Waffe überprüfen.

translation.en: Right.
Oh, but yeah. Okay, I'll get on it. [chuckles]
translation.de: Ja. Ok. Ich kümmere mich darum.

translation.en: Yeah. And while you're there, chase them up on the bullets.
translation.de: Ja. Und frage auch nach den Kugeln.

translation.en: I requested a matching review to see if the killer's gun could be linked to any other incidents.
translation.de: Ich will überprüfen, ob die Waffe mit anderen Vorfällen in Verbindung steht.

translation.en: -Ballistics, bullets. Yes, Cap. -Hey, whoa.
Don't. Never-- Never do that again. Just…
translation.de: Nicht. Tu das nie wieder. Also…

translation.en: No "Cap."
What… What is that?
Oh, it's, uh, chocolate, whey protein, spinach, and a little bit of banana.
translation.de: Es ist Schokolade, Molkeprotein, Spinat und etwas Banane.

translation.en: [chuckles] Did you want to…
-You should… -I should. Yeah, okay, well, I'll…
-I'll see you-- I'll see you back at-- -Yep.
[groans] God help me.
Hello, you reach Izabella. Please leave a message and I'll get back to you.
translation.de: Hallo, hier ist Izabella. Hinterlassen Sie eine Nachricht, ich rufe zurück.

translation.en: Call Charlie.
-Hello? -Charlie, it's Maya.
Have you seen Izabella up your way?
Uh, yeah, I think I saw her come back a little while ago.
translation.de: Ja, sie kam vor einer Weile zurück.

translation.en: -Think she's at the house in the grounds. -All right. Okay. Thanks. Bye.
translation.de: -Ich glaube, sie ist im Haus. -Ok. Danke. Tschüss.

translation.en: -[Lily humming] -Come on then.
[Maya] Yeah.
-Hi, Lily. Hi, Auntie Maya. -Hi, Dan. We haven't seen you in ages.
translation.de: -Hi, Lily. Hi, Tante Maya. -Hi, Dan. Wir sahen dich ewig nicht mehr.

translation.en: -Sorry, Auntie Maya. -[chuckles] Is your dad in?
-Yeah, just inside. -Yeah. Come on, then.
[Maya] There you go. Go and find Abby.
-[Abby] Hey, Lily! Hello. -[gentle music playing]
[Maya] Always amazing.
-Eddie. -All right.
Do you mind looking after Lily for me for an hour? I need to speak to someone.
translation.de: Passt du auf Lily auf? Ich muss mit jemandem reden.

translation.en: Yeah, whatever.
-Auntie Maya! -Abby! Aw!
I'll come and see you today. Maybe second half.
translation.de: Ich schaue dir heute zu. Vielleicht zweite Hälfte.

translation.en: -You don't need to. -No, I want to.
-How are you getting there? -[Eddie] How do you think?
What, with that in your hand?
One drink. I'm fine.
I don't drink and drive, Maya. It's one drink.
translation.de: Ich trinke nicht beim Fahren. Es ist ein Drink.

translation.en: It's bad enough that the kids are living in the house that their mum was killed in.
translation.de: Schlimm genug, dass die Kinder im Haus leben, in dem ihre Mutter ermordet wurde.

translation.en: The boxes…
Let me take them out.
-I'm dealing with it. -Saying that for weeks.
Well, maybe you'll understand when you start to throw Joe's stuff.
translation.de: Vielleicht verstehst du es, wenn du Joes Sachen wegwirfst.

translation.en: Know how it feels now, don't you?
translation.de: Du weißt, wie es sich anfühlt?

translation.en: Please, let me help.
-My wife, my problem. -Yeah, and my sister, Eddie.
translation.de: -Meine Frau, mein Problem. -Ja, und meine Schwester, Eddie.

translation.en: I think that trumps marriage.
I know I wasn't here as much as she'd have liked.
translation.de: Ich war nicht so oft hier, wie sie wollte.

translation.en: But you were off saving the world?
She hated you being away. You know that.
translation.de: Sie hasste es, dass du weg warst.

translation.en: She was worried every shithole conflict you went to would be your last,
translation.de: Sie hatte Angst, dass jeder Scheißkonflikt dein letzter sein würde,

translation.en: and one day she'd get a call telling her as much.
translation.de: und dass sie eines Tages angerufen würde.

translation.en: But it was the other way around.
Hiya.
-Hey. -Why are you at Farnwood?
I've been, uh, updating Judith. How's the nanny situation?
translation.de: Ich hielt Judith auf dem Laufenden. Wie läuft's mit der Nanny?

translation.en: Right.
Well, I'm going to see Izabella now to talk about it.
translation.de: Ich fahre jetzt zu Izabella, um darüber zu reden.

translation.en: Asking what?
If she saw Joe.
-Why she took my SD card. -Come on, Maya.
Listen, I know.
Maybe I am going crazy.
But she saw what I saw.
translation.de: Aber sie sah, was ich sah.

translation.en: And now she won't even speak to me.
translation.de: Jetzt redet sie nicht mehr mit mir.

translation.en: -Do you want me to come with you? -No, thanks.
All right, well, be careful.
He's gone, Maya.
You know that.
See you.
Izabella, it's Maya.
Will you just open the door?
Please. I just need to talk to you about Joe.
translation.de: Bitte. Ich muss mit dir über Joe reden.

translation.en: I know you're in.
I can see your feet.
I'm sorry I grabbed you. I panicked. Just…
translation.de: Tut mir leid. Ich geriet in Panik.

translation.en: Just please open the door.
Ah, hi.
What's all this?
Oh yeah, they, uh-- they changed it. Don't know why.
translation.de: Oh ja, sie haben es geändert. Ich weiß nicht, warum.

translation.en: It's awful.
It's a car.
It's green.
Looks like Kermit. Kermit vomit.
Feel free to walk home after dance lesson.
translation.de: Du kannst nach der Tanzstunde laufen.

translation.en: -I'd rather. -Do.
I will.
Very nice.
-[teacher] That's it. -Disappointing.
-I'm so sorry. I-- I don't know the-- -I'll close up late.
translation.de: -Sorry. Ich weiß nicht… -Ich mache spät zu.

translation.en: -Don't worry. -Thought it was lovely.
-You do know-- -Yeah, sure.
-You're making me look bad. -Yeah, yeah.
-That was bad. -[chuckling]
-Drag. Drag. -♪ You're my symphony ♪
-[teacher] Two, three, four. Slide. Slide. -♪ You're the most supreme ♪
-Stop it. Stop. -Stop.
-I'm so sorry. I'm sorry. -Um…
-Sorry. -[Molly laughs]
How long till the wedding?
-Stop it. Don't laugh. -[laughing]
-Four weeks. -Four weeks. Yeah.
We've got our work cut out.
Stop it, please. Please.
-[sniffles] -Sorry.
[coach] Don't give the ball away. Chase it. Chase it. Keep moving. Come on.
translation.de: Gib den Ball nicht ab. Jage ihn. Weiter. Komm schon.

translation.en: Let's go.
-Go on, Abby! Go on! -[coach] Pretend it's a donut, Abby.
translation.de: -Los, Abby! Los! -Tu so, als wäre es ein Donut, Abby.

translation.en: That'll get you moving. My granny could play better than you.
translation.de: Das bringt dich in Bewegung. Meine Oma spielte besser.

translation.en: Move it. Faster, you bloody donkeys! Come on! Faster! Talk to each other! Come on!
translation.de: Bewegt euch. Schneller, ihr Esel! Schneller! Redet miteinander! Los!

translation.en: Don't give it away!
[coach] Chase it! Quicker. Quicker. Come on!
Come on!
Abby, challenge! Challenge!
Awful.
-Ref! Number five. -[whistle blows]
Abby, off.
Off!
Awful.
Woeful.
Maybe ease up on the cakes. Yeah? Your bulk's not helping.
translation.de: Etwas weniger Kuchen. Deine Masse hilft nicht.

translation.en: -Hey! Coach. -Middle of a game here.
-Yeah, I'm Maya Stern. I'm Abby's aunt. -Maya, don't.
translation.de: Ich bin Maya Stern. Abbys Tante. -Maya, nicht. -Ich weiß, wer Sie sind, Captain.

translation.en: [coach] Yeah, I know who you are, Captain.
translation.de: -Maya, nicht. -Ich weiß, wer Sie sind, Captain.

translation.en: -I'm talking to you. -What?
They're kids. I'm ex-forces, and I've heard sergeant majors go easier.
translation.de: Das sind Kinder. So reden nicht einmal Oberfeldwebel.

translation.en: -They're embarrassing themselves. -No, no, you are.
-You can't speak to kids like that. -Who the hell are you? I'm a winner.
translation.de: So redet man nicht mit Kindern. Wer sind Sie? Ich bin ein Sieger.

translation.en: -Oh my God. -Yeah? You want rainbows and bluebells?
Well, get her in the art club. Now, excuse me. I’m coaching a team.
translation.de: Die gibt's im Kunstklub. Ich trainiere ein Team.

translation.en: Okay, yeah. You're a rude man.
-Whatever. -Yeah.
-Don't turn your back on me. -Get off.
translation.de: -Kehren Sie mir nicht den Rücken zu. -Weg.

translation.en: I said, don't turn your back on me!
translation.de: Ich sagte, kehren Sie mir nicht den Rücken zu!

translation.en: Cunt.
-You fucking-- -Go on.
Give me an excuse to put you down.
translation.de: Gib mir einen Vorwand, dich fertigzumachen.

translation.en: -[tense music playing] -Go on.
-Nah, you're not worth it. -Yeah, I thought so.
translation.de: -Du bist es nicht wert. -Ja, das dachte ich mir.

translation.en: -Bye. [chuckles] -Do one.
Come on, wake up!
You okay?
Yeah? Don't worry. Come on.
[Eddie] Maya.
-Wait in the car, please. -Oh, here we go.
-I don't want you around my children. -Oh, Eddie, come on. The guy was a bully.
translation.de: -Bleib den Kindern fern. -Der Typ war ein Tyrann.

translation.en: It's not just that.
-You don't get it, do you? -No. Obviously I don't. No.
The army. That incident.
Then Claire, now Joe.
Death follows you, Maya.
You sure you've only had that one drink?
You think I wasn't torn in half when my sister died?
translation.de: Glaubst du, ich war nicht am Boden, als meine Schwester starb?

translation.en: I wasn't even here, Eddie. They're her kids.
translation.de: Ich war nicht mal hier. Das sind ihre Kinder.

translation.en: -They're all I have left of her. -Stay away.
translation.de: -Alles, was ich von ihr habe. -Hau ab.

translation.en: -No, you can't do that! -You stay the fuck away!
In the car, please!
Dick.
So, I spoke with Sharon about the dress.
translation.de: Ich sprach mit Sharon über das Kleid.

translation.en: She said that this little fella will definitely show,
translation.de: Sie meinte, dass man diesen kleinen Kerl sehen wird,

translation.en: but she said she can do some kind of,
I don't know, frill thing to conceal it a bit.
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht, es mit Rüsche etwas verdecken.

translation.en: But everyone attending knows that you're pregnant, so…
translation.de: Aber alle Anwesenden wissen, dass du schwanger bist.

translation.en: It's our wedding day, Sami.
I want to look the blushing bride… -[sighs] -…not like we're dashing down the aisle
translation.de: Sie sollen nicht denken, dass wir zum Altar schreiten,

translation.en: because you managed to slip one past the goalie.
[softly] Yeah.
Hello?
What's up?
I'm sorry, it's just…
It's just this murder.
Plus, they gave me a partner.
Is that a bad thing?
Yes.
He's about three. A health nut.
Duran Duran came on the radio. He'd never even heard of them.
translation.de: Duran Duran lief. Er hatte nie von ihnen gehört.

translation.en: -What a bastard. -No, no. [sighs]
Never heard of Duran Duran?
I'm not saying he should like them, not saying he should recite their lyrics,
translation.de: Er muss sie nicht mögen oder die Texte auswendig können,

translation.en: but he never even heard of them.
translation.de: aber er hat nie von ihnen gehört.

translation.en: No, I agree. He should be fired immediately.
translation.de: Nein, ich stimme zu. Er sollte sofort gefeuert werden.

translation.en: Come here, you big, daft bugger.
-Listen. -[exhales]
It's a job, Sami.
An important job, but a job nonetheless.
translation.de: Ein wichtiger Job, aber trotzdem ein Job.

translation.en: Yeah. Yep, yep, yep.
Come here.
-[computer chimes] -Oh.
Two, thanks.
-Same again? -Yes.
-Some fresh-- -Yeah, no, I told him.
Hello?
Yo. It's Marty. I've, um, just sent you the ballistics report
on the bullets that killed Joe Burkett. Have you got it?
translation.de: von den Kugeln, die Joe Burkett töteten. Hast du ihn?

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, I got it.
Yeah. You're not going to believe your eyes.
translation.de: Ja. Du wirst deinen Augen nicht trauen.

translation.en: BULLETS MATCH THOSE FROM A 9MM GLOCK 17 4TH GEN
translation.de: DIE KUGELN PASSEN ZU EINER 9MM GLOCK 17 4. GEN

translation.en: -[Shane] Who wants a hot dog? -[Maya] Shane, got you this.
-[Shane] Beer! -There you go. Here you are, Bono.
-Thank you. -When's your next tour kicking off?
-Two weeks now. -[Maya] Two weeks?
-God, that's soon. -I know.
Gotta say, I'm glad you're not going back there.
Although if it wasn't for you, Brian wouldn't be here. So…
translation.de: Obwohl Ben ohne dich nicht hier wäre. Also…

translation.en: -[clinks] -Not sure whether that's a good thing.
translation.de: Weiß nicht, ob das gut ist.

translation.en: -Oh! -[chuckles] No!
-I know what you're gonna do. -No? -Mm, yeah! -[bottle clinking]
-No! Shane! -Toast!
-For God's sake. -Toast!
-Come on in. Gather in. -[Maya] I hate when he does this.
-Maya. -[Maya] No.
-Yes. Well, I wanted to thank you… -[chuckles]
translation.de: Ja. Ich wollte dir dafür danken,

translation.en: …for having us bunch of degenerates over at your humble palace, maybe?
translation.de: dass ein Haufen Degenerierter in deinem bescheidenen Palast sein dürfen.

translation.en: And I think I speak for everybody when I say…
translation.de: Ich spreche für alle, wenn ich sage,

translation.en: [breathes deeply] …we've missed you loads, little sister.
-Thank you. -[Shane] Haven't we?
[all] Yeah.
Hey, stay strong.
-Oh, for God's sake, stop it! -Okay, okay, okay.
-To Maya… -Sit down. -…the best combat copter pilot I've ever flown with, our Captain.
translation.de: Auf Maya, die beste Hubschrauberpilotin, mit der ich geflogen bin, unser Captain.

translation.en: -[all] To Maya! -Sit down.
And little Lily the hurricane!
-[all] Cheers. -[man] Cheers, mate.
[Maya sighs in relief] Cheers. You okay?
-[Maya] Stop it. -Stop what?
You. You're treating me like a widow.
translation.de: Du behandelst mich wie eine Witwe.

translation.en: Maya, I hate to break it to you, but that's exactly what you are.
translation.de: Ich sage es nur ungern, aber genau das bist du.

translation.en: Which is convenient, really, because you've always suited black.
translation.de: Praktisch, denn du hast immer Schwarz getragen.

translation.en: [boy] A big one.
I know this is going to sound crazy, Shane.
translation.de: Ich weiß, das klingt verrückt, Shane.

translation.en: But I keep thinking that I'm seeing him.
translation.de: Aber ich denke, ich sehe ihn.

translation.en: It's natural, Maya.
People do this all the time.
When you lose someone, it's like…
I dunno. It's like you still want them to be there, you know?
translation.de: Man will immer noch, dass sie da sind.

translation.en: Yeah.
I'm going to sound even crazier now when I tell you this.
translation.de: Es wird gleich noch verrückter klingen.

translation.en: -Uh-oh. -[inhales sharply]
I think I'm being followed. By who?
I don't know.
I've seen the same car twice.
translation.de: Ich habe dasselbe Auto zweimal gesehen.

translation.en: I've noted down the plate. It's a red Volkswagen.
translation.de: Ich hab das Nummernschild. Roter Volkswagen.

translation.en: -Do you think you can find the owner? -[sighs] Not legally.
translation.de: Kannst du den Besitzer finden? -Nicht legal. -Aber du kannst.

translation.en: Yeah, but you can.
Yeah, send it to me.
Thanks.
-Mother-in-law. -Good luck.
Hello?
Maya, what happened? Izabella's saying she won't work for you anymore.
translation.de: Maya, was war? Izabella will nicht mehr für dich arbeiten.

translation.en: She's here now.
Right, well, don't let her leave. I'll come over now, yeah? Keep her there.
translation.de: Lass sie nicht gehen. Ich komme rüber, ja?

translation.en: -Shane-- -Look after Lily?
-Yeah. -Got you.
-Luka. -You attack her.
-Izabella! What'd you do with the SD card? -Fuck you. She's scared of you!
translation.de: Izabella! Was hast du mit der SD-Karte gemacht? -Sie hat Angst vor dir! -Lass mich vorbei.

translation.en: Let me past, or I swear to God--
translation.de: -Sie hat Angst vor dir! -Lass mich vorbei.

translation.en: -Leave her alone. -I just need to talk to her about Joe.
translation.de: -Lass sie in Ruhe. -Ich muss mit ihr über Joe reden.

translation.en: -Leave her-- -She fucking pepper sprayed me!
You can't run from this!
Why did you let her leave?
What was I supposed to do? Keep her prisoner?
I needed to speak with her, Judith.
She says you attacked her.
-I didn't attack her. -You laid hands on her?
translation.de: -Das hab ich nicht. -Hast du sie angefasst?

translation.en: -Yes. -Then what's the difference, Maya?
-Why did you do that? -Why was she here?
translation.de: -Warum hast du das getan? -Warum war sie hier?

translation.en: Well, her family has been employed by ours for many years.
translation.de: Ihre Familie arbeitet seit vielen Jahren für uns.

translation.en: -Long before you came. -Oh, so you believe her?
Does it matter that I was married to your son? Does it matter that I'm the mother of your grandchild?
translation.de: Ich war mit deinem Sohn verheiratet. Ich bin die Mutter deines Enkelkindes.

translation.en: She says she caught you spying.
And did she tell you what I saw?
No. No.
I saw Joe.
I saw Joe, Judith.
On the camera.
I don't know how, but that's what I saw.
translation.de: Keine Ahnung, wie, aber das habe ich gesehen.

translation.en: So answer me this.
How can a dead man appear on a secret camera?
translation.de: Wie kann ein Toter auf einer geheimen Kamera erscheinen?

translation.en: How can-- How can a dead man cuddle his own daughter?
translation.de: Wie kann ein Toter seine Tochter knuddeln?

translation.en: Stop it. Stop this.
Now, you know that can't be true.
-You… wanted to see him… -[scoffs] …so you saw him.
translation.de: Du wolltest ihn sehen, also hast du ihn gesehen.

translation.en: -And then you started accusing Izabella. -It wasn't a vision, Judith. He was there.
translation.de: -Dann hast du Izabella beschuldigt. -Es war keine Vision. Er war da.

translation.en: Maya, it's your subconscious. Don't fucking analyze me, Judith.
translation.de: -Es ist dein Unterbewusstsein. -Analysiere mich nicht, verdammt.

translation.en: -Please don't swear in my home. -I know what I saw.
What, my dead son whom we buried?
translation.de: Mein toter Sohn, den wir beerdigten?

translation.en: I'm going to tell you the truth now, Maya. I'm worried about you.
translation.de: Ich sag dir die Wahrheit, Maya. Ich mache mir Sorgen um dich.

translation.en: All those things you went through when you were abroad.
translation.de: Was du im Ausland durchgemacht hast…

translation.en: -I'm fine. -You never dealt with them.
translation.de: -Mir geht's gut. -Du hast dich nie damit befasst.

translation.en: -Are you saying I'm going mad? -No, I'm saying you never dealt with them.
translation.de: -Bin ich verrückt? -Nein, du hast dich nie damit befasst.

translation.en: Or the scandal that followed.
And if I'm to be brutally honest,
I wonder whether you are in a fit state to be looking after that little girl right now.
translation.de: frage ich mich, ob du dich um das kleine Mädchen kümmern kannst.

translation.en: Don't you dare question my parenting.
I saw him.
And I'm not going mad.
Did you love him, Maya?
What?
Simple question. My son, did you love him?
translation.de: Einfache Frage. Hast du meinen Sohn geliebt?

translation.en: You know I did.
Because I did, to my core.
But sometimes, when you were together--
translation.de: Aber manchmal, wenn ihr zusammen wart…

translation.en: -I loved him! -[dramatic sting]
But if I'm honest, Judith…
I did often wonder,
was there a voice in his ear,
translation.de: ob da eine Stimme in seinem Ohr war,

translation.en: a little voice…
saying, "Is she good enough…
this bit of rough?"
"Was she really good enough for my special boy?"
translation.de: War sie wirklich gut genug für meinen besonderen Jungen?"

translation.en: Because I'm not one of you.
Am I?
And I never will be.
translation.de: Und ich werde es nie sein.

translation.en: [Maya] Okay, come in.
Hiya.
We're just having a bit of a barbecue.
Maya, the, um, 9-millimeter bullets we recovered from your husband's body,
translation.de: Maya, die 9mm-Kugeln von der Leiche Ihres Mannes…

translation.en: we ran them through ballistics to see if the bullets matched
any of the cases on our database.
translation.de: zu Fällen in unserer Datenbank passen.

translation.en: And they did.
They did.
The gun that killed your husband…
translation.de: Die Waffe, mit der Ihr Mann getötet wurde,

translation.en: -was also used to kill your sister… -[eerie music playing]
…Claire Walker.
